reviewText: The cover art is a copyrighted image belonging to KIXEYE Inc mobile video games.  It has nothing to do with the movie and is used without permission.  A takedown demand under DMCA has been filed with Amazon.
This wasn't my cup of...  The cover art isn't relevant to the movie as someone else pointed out.
Terrible 80s movie. Cover picture has nothing to do with the movie.

The movie involves a plot to take over the world with a bunch of guys that look like Lou Reed. If that doesn't make you want to watch this movie then what will? Seriously, Lou Reed world domination! A hero that looks like a daddy and has the body of a daddy too. A ton of Wild Bunch style slow mo shoot outs.

In all seriousness, it's a fun b-movie that worth tracking down. It's a shame that there aren't more movies like this out there. High on ambition even if it's not quite hitting it's mark.
